Class PluginOverviewStats

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.reporting.OverviewStats
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.reporting.PluginOverviewStats
public class PluginOverviewStats extends OverviewStats
Extension of the OverviewStats adding dependency stats

    • fromUpdates

      public static <T extends OverviewStats, V extends AbstractVersionDetails> T fromUpdates(Collection<V> updates, ArtifactVersionsCache cache, boolean allowSnapshots)
      Creates a PluginOverviewStats instance based on the collection of version updates in the argument
      Type Parameters:
      T - always equal to PluginOverviewStats
      V - always equal to PluginUpdatesDetails
      Parameters:
      updates - collection of all version updates, typically from AbstractUpdatesModel.getAllUpdates()
      cache - if not null, cache to retrieve the version information, initialised with the AbstractVersionDetails.getNewestUpdateWithinSegment(Optional, boolean) update information
      allowSnapshots - whether snapshots should be included
      Returns:
      instance of the PluginOverviewStats, initialised with the update information
